title: Kim Davis To Be Released From Jail
content:
Posted Tuesday, September 8th 2015 @ 1pm 
 
An attorney for a jailed Kentucky court clerk says his client will be released today.  Court documents show that as a condition of her release from jail, Rowan County Clerk Kim Davis will not interfere in deputy clerks issuing marriage licenses to same-sex couples.  Davis has been jailed since Thursday on a contempt charge for defying a federal judge's order to issue those licenses.
